sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Procter & Gamble ( PG ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.9%.
Year to date, Procter & Gamble registers a 5.2% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Chevron ( CVX ), trading down 0.9%.
Chevron is lower by about 7.8% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Visa ( V ), trading down 0.7%, and Microsoft Corporation ( MSFT ), trading up 1.3% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
